paper_title: Topological transitivity of Kan-type partially hyperbolic diffeomorphisms
abstract: It is presented the topological transitivity of a class of diffeomorphisms on the thickened torus, including the partially hyperbolic example introduced by Ittai Kan in 1994, which is well known for the first systems with intermingled basins phenomenon.
publication_venue: 14 pages, 4 figures, all comments are welcome!
